mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.name cname from (select cid, ifnull(sum(purchase), 0) purchase, ifnull(sum(sell), 0) sell, ifnull(sum(profit), 0) profit from stat_profit_goods group by cid) t1 join sys_category t2 on t1.cid = t2.id
mapper.insert: insert into stat_finish_order (purchase, sell, time) values (#{purchase}, #{sell}, #{time})
insert into stat_profit_total (purchase, sell, profit, time) values (#{purchase}, #{sell}, #{profit}, #{time})

insert into stat_profit_goods (cid, purchase, sell, profit, time) values
(#{item.cid}, #{item.purchase}, #{item.sell}, #{item.profit}, #{item.time})
mapper.select: select count(0) from biz_purchase_order where status = 2 and finish = 2 and ftime between unix_timestamp(cast(sysdate() as date) - interval 1 day) * 1000 and unix_timestamp(cast(sysdate() as date)) * 1000

select t1.*, t2.name cname from (select a.cid, ifnull(sum(a.num * a.price), 0) purchase from biz_purchase_order_sub a join biz_purchase_order b on a.pid = b.id where b.vtime between #{start} and #{end} group by a.cid) t1 join sys_category t2 on t1.cid = t2.id

select count(0) from biz_sell_order where status = 2 and finish = 2 and ftime between unix_timestamp(cast(sysdate() as date) - interval 1 day) * 1000 and unix_timestamp(cast(sysdate() as date)) * 1000

select t1.*, t2.name cname from (select a.cid, ifnull(sum(a.num * a.price), 0) sell from biz_sell_order_sub a join biz_sell_order b on a.pid = b.id where b.vtime between #{start} and #{end} group by a.cid) t1 join sys_category t2 on t1.cid = t2.id
